title: Setting y to zero
text: To find the x-intercept of a function, we start by setting the y value to 0, so we get the $$equation-|x+4|-3=0$$.

title: Isolating the absoluate value
text: Then, we should isolate the part with absolute value. We get the equation $$|x+4|=-3$$.

title: Solving equation with absoluate values
text: Since an absolute value can never be negative, we say that this equation has no solution.
